question: Which steel plant of India was recently awarded at the WEF Annual meet, for being included in the WEF's Lighthouse Network?
explanation:
Tata Steel Kalinganagar was recently awarded at the WEF Annual meet, for being included in the WEF\'s Lighthouse Network.
In July 2019, Tata Steel Kalinganagar became the first and only Indian manufacturing plant to be included in the coveted ‘Lighthouse Network’ of the World Economic Forum. Other ten manufacturing plants from around the world were also included in the network. Tata Steel\'s IJmuiden plant located in the Netherlands has already been included in the network.
